CustomField.formula: OCE__Account__r.OCE__AccountFullName__c & ', ' & OCE__AddressLine1__c & IF( ISBLANK(OCE__AddressLine2__c), '' , ', '& OCE__AddressLine2__c ) & IF( ISBLANK(OCE__AddressLine3__c), '' , ', '& OCE__AddressLine3__c ) & IF( ISBLANK(OCE__AddressLine4__c), '' , ', '& OCE__AddressLine4__c ) & IF( ISBLANK(OCE__City__c), '', ', '& OCE__City__c ) & IF( ISBLANK(OCE__State__c), '' , ', '& OCE__State__c ) & IF( ISBLANK(OCE__Country__c), '' , ', '& OCE__Country__c ) & IF( ISBLANK(OCE__ZipCode__c), '' , ', '& OCE__ZipCode__c )
CustomField.label: Formatted Address
